review: Love it.. I now can get Netflix and a host of other networks and didn't have to upgrade my old blueray player.. :)
author: Amazon Customer

review: Great product. Just plug and play. Great selection of videos and movies. I had an older model TV that wouldn't hook up to wifi and this solves my problem. I can also watch my phone through the Fire TV Stick.I am not technologically savvy and this has been a great tool for me to use.Thanks Amazon!
author: Farmwife68

review: Amazon has done it again! The Fire Stick is a must have for anyone who is an Amazon Prime subscriber.
author: afamilyofamazoners

review: at first it did not work, picture quality was not good and kept loading on Netflix and amazon prime video. being frustrated with all the good reviews and mine not working being right beside my router, I reset my gateway, apparently my wifi was the problem , not the fire stick.
author: Amazon Customer

review: 10 minute setup-no problems-thanks very much-great product especially the included, remote-thanks very much. I have never been disappointed with anything  from Amazon. You people are fantastic. Thanks again.
author: Chester Martin

review: Works and no problems for me
author: Larno

review: Exactly what I was looking for! I received it fast and the set up was super easy. Viewing all the things I wanted to be able to view with it!
author: Starlene L. Grochowicz "astra24"

review: Love it! It works great...so many movies and TV shows, it keeps so much easieradults and grandchildren entertained! It's so small and easy to install...I can throw it in my purse when we go to our summer home to be used there. So much easier than accessing net flix, etc from your Blue ray disc player.
author: Alice
